attributes.action: We Want the government to help the campaign Black Lives Matter, and take action!
attributes.additional_details: Check the Youtube Channel - 'SafTube'  as me and my group went out and went to raise awareness and made a video on it!
attributes.background: We want the government to help stop abuse to black people by police and to take action on randm stops and searches on black people!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for changes to the legal guidelines about how stop and search is used. The Government made changes to this in 2014 - you can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/stop-and-search-theresa-may-announces-reform-of-police-stop-and-search
